page.title: 01EMPLOYMENT QUESTIONNAIRE
page.content:
{EMPLOYMENT QUESTIONNAIRE; FOR D-BLOCK.
As part of our Domesday survey we sent out a questionaire through pupils in our school who lived in the survey area concerning employment and migration. We recieved 54 replies, which was less than half of those sent out,but is still a usefull sample size. The questionaires were interpreted using bar charts for each of the ten questions,allowing us to work out averages and trends from the raw data.These,along with conclusions drawn up by a Sixth-Form Geography set can be seen on pages 2-7. The nature of the survey was quite sporadic and the results are by no means comprehensive,but it is felt that the conclusions can be taken as being representative of the area.
